info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Builds a new bit measure concatenating measure array b to measure array a.
[Parameters] - input data type : not used. - output data type : not used. - measure a : first input bit-measure. - measure b : second input bit-measure.
[Return type] Bit-array.
[Examples] oph_bit_concat('','',measure_a,measure_b)
info.author: CMCC
